lead_paragraph: Forget Neymar and Pele. Children in Rio de Janeiro are lifting their sights and their swords to new idols as a round of fencing workshops takes to public schools.

headline.print_headline: In Soccer-Mad Brazil, Fencing Targets Young Fans for Olympics
headline.main: In Soccer-Mad Brazil, Fencing Targets Young Fans for Olympics
